lenders.occupational_info: I am director of a public library district in northern Idaho (USA) about 70 miles south of the British Columbia (Canada) border. See the library web page  @ http://www.ebcl.lib.id.us/ebcl/ .

I’ve resolved to give a $25.00 donation from each pay check and, as my income expands, will increase this amount.  My ultimate goal is to establish a war chest of $5,000 that I can use to help others with.

ここ１６年間毎年夏に集まっている仲間なので、それを名前にすることにしました。（絵に何故１２人しかいないと不思議に思っている方へ：最初の融資先に貢献した人数です！）

lenders.occupational_info: عملى ممتع لاقصى درجه ولكن سوء الادارة من قبل امدير التنفيذى جعلنى اكره العمل رغم ما اقدمه من مساعدات وخدمات للمحتاجين وكم اكون سعيدا وانا استطيع مد يد العون للمحتاج ولكن مركزية الادارة وحب النفوز والسيطره جعلنى افكر فى الاستقلال والبحث عن بديل لمساعدة الغير دو ان اتسبب فى ايذاء احد وان اطبق ماتعلمته خلال زيارتى لامريكا ضمن برنامج الزائر الدولى

lenders.name: Ryan Johnson
lenders.loan_because: I care about the world and the people that live in it, and I 100% trust Kiva to do the right thing with my donation.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for The MENTOR Network, which is a multi-demensional organization taking care of at-risk youth and developmentally challenged individuals, including providing host home, foster home, and group homes/community development. I just recently started but I am already so passionate about the company and think what these mentors do on a daily basis is such amazing work. I always wanted to give a bit like this even if it is in a small way, being in IT where my skills are but supporting such an important team of people in the field. 

Kiva is to me just as important in giving  anything to people much less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.loan_because: I like mice.
lenders.occupational_info: Mice are awesome.

lenders.name: J.E.M.S. Tutoring
lenders.loan_because: Money is not in need where we are, so it can be used as needed elsewhere.
lenders.occupational_info: J.E.M.S. Tutoring is a nonprofit organization that tutors students from K-12 all the way through College courses across California. The organization is controlled by undergraduate and graduate students that have been blessed with the opportunity of a College education.  All proceeds are dedicated to international donation to help people across the globe.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: There is no more heart warming investment on the planet than helping other people achieve their hopes and dreams. Every time I open my KIVA profile I smile at the photos of "my people" and envision them at work in their towns and villages, selling bags of rice, milking cows, sweeping their shops, repairing their homes, feeding their children, and I feel enriched by my tiny stake in their lives.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We wish you all the best in your business. You are very smart and brave. Keep up the good work!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I love this concept...simple, personal and effective.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English as a Second Language teacher.  I teach kids whose first language is not English and whose families have come to this country for a variety of reasons to start a new life.  I love other languages and cultures and helping people adjust to a new setting while maintaining their sense of identity and pride in their heritage.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I care very much about international development, believe in micro-enterprise and especially love Uganda, both the country and its people.
lenders.occupational_info: I joined the provincial government as a writer but have since switched to government administration. I work behind the scenes to help municipalities, largely through advisory services and project management.

lenders.name: Andrea & Wilkin
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have expendable income, and feel like I want to be able to share that with people who can use that for their own economic development.  I believe in the micro-credit model and think it can assist families across the world become self-sustaining entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Christal
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
